alfredsnippet.snippet:
(cont'd)

"... They will condescendingly point to a lack of proper (i.e. double-blind) scientific studies supporting certain alternative procedures, and simultaneously ignore the fact that many conventional surgical procedures and drug protocols are equally unproven by the same standard. Worse yet, they will hold alternative medicine responsible for every case of malpractice that has ever been committed in its name, but they would not dream of applying the same standard to conventional medical practice."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Pseudoskeptics Are Not Real Skeptics - Part 2
